Minor or Major in the communication studies programs. The professor are great. FInd a professor or advisor that you trust and try to graduate early. Take study abroad opportunities.
The department of Communication Studies is top quality. The professors are passionate about their jobs and love helping students. Lucky to have great professors

There is a few different options but when I attended school there 2007-2009 I wasn't impressed with the options. There is also a Subway and Dominos but I personally don't like either. The Dining Hall had a few different options like a salad bar and a sandwich station but nothing is great., 186873=Sober living...AA meetings. Great idea just not a big turn out back in 2004-2005.}

textAfterTable: Am learning a lot The class sizes are just right here and you are able to get to know professors if you try. If you want a good education you can certainly get one here but if you just want to party, you won't be alone. College is different than high school, you do have to try and study to learn but it's not difficult and SCSU has a lot of resources to help you out. Login to rate or flag the reviews Amanda from Racine, WI 09/25/2009 Reviewer is A current student here. 8 out of 9 people found this review useful. 3 of 73 Categories Comments Great for these types of students People who love to be social and aren't afraid of making new friends are going to blossom here. Dorming your first year is the best way to meet new people. People who are coming internationally will also love SCSU. We have a large population of international students and have made a lot of accommodations for them to still
